patthana17.21:4.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:4.2: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:4.3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:4.4: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:4.5: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:4.6: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana17.21:4.7: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:5.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:6.1: Hetuyā cuddasa, adhipatiyā cuddasa … pe … avigate cuddasa.
patthana17.21:7.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:8.1: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:9.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.21:10.1: Hetuyā adhipatiyā ekavīsati … pe … avigate ekavīsati.
patthana17.21:11.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto abyākato dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana17.21:12.1: Ārammaṇe ekavīsati, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha … pe … upanissaye ekavīsati, natthiyā vigate cha.
patthana17.21:12.4: (Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaabyākatamūlaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaabyākatamūlampi kātabbaṃ.)
